kpi_info.title: Background Block Errors on the SDH Path
kpi_info.use: Background Block Errors (BBE) on the SDH Path (B3):Counts the number of errored blocks not occurring during SES or UAS.Errored block: A block in which one or more bits are corrupted. Detected by inspecting the bit interleaved parity (BIP) information.Standard: [G.826] The counter is updated every second by the number of errored blocks received during that second. The value is incremented only if the interface is available and not severely errored.
